mapper.insert: insert into board(boardnum, boardtitle, boardcontent , email) values(#{boardnum}, #{boardtitle}, #{boardcontent},#{email} )
mapper.select: SELECT boardnum , boardtitle, boardreadcnt, nickname ,updatedate from board, members WHERE board.email = members.email order by updatedate desc
SELECT boardnum , boardtitle,boardreadcnt, nickname ,updatedate from board, members WHERE board.email = members.email order by updatedate desc LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{page}
select boardnum, boardtitle, boardcontent, nickname, updatedate from board, members where board.email = members.email and boardnum = #{boardnum}
mapper.update: update board set boardreadcnt = boardreadcnt + 1 where boardnum =#{boardnum}
update board set boardtitle = #{boardtitle},boardcontent = #{boardcontent}, updatedate=now() where boardnum =#{boardnum}
